name: Go - Game
description:
Go - Game is an adversarial,opening strategy,board game for two players that originated in China more than 2,500 years ago.   The goal of the game is to surround more territory than your opponent does.  Go - Game is a software specifically developed to help the beginners to learn about playing go skills and let you play with your colleagues or your computer . It is very helpful for you to study and improve your go skills while you enjoy it to play with others.

Features highlights:
1. Handily, anywhere, anytime you can play the game of go.

2. Not only play with your colleagues, but also with your computer with artificial intelligence, it is really free for you to enjoy.

3. Multiple board sizes include 9x9、11x11、13x13 and 19x19 .

4. Handicap functions.

5. Automatic score calculation.

6. Realistic sound effects.

7. Reset the game,take back or change a move anytime.

8. Friendly 3 input methods. There are 3 options of input methods (Zoom、Cursor & touch). Tap-to-zoom makes it simple to play the right move every time at iPhone.

9. Save /Load game record anytime.

10. Send game record(sgf file) anytime.

11. You can also play with the other by peer to peer.

12. It is very useful for those who are the complete beginners to understand and study the game of go.


* 100% Pure Software
Go - Game will not do anything without your permission. It won’t automatically collect your personal data, send your personal data to internet, or install any bundled software.

Feedback:
Any suggestion will be appreciated, support email: 459788263@qq.com
